name: SpooderMan Swing
description:
This is my first game. I hope ye like it. I sadly had to  upload it early because of timezones and I didn't get any time to add polish but I hope it's ok. It's an infinite side-scrolling swinging simulator and that's about it.

Instructions:

The paparazzi are trying to overwhelm you.

They've Occupied the Ground.

Don't let this happen.

If you touch the ground you lose 1 out of 3 lives.

Left click to attatch web.

Swing with A and D.

Jump with space.

Escape to quit and restart.
